articles.author: Kris Gourlay
articles.title: Edinburgh chef Tom Kitchin welcomes life-long friend Gordon Ramsay to his restaurant - Edinburgh Live
articles.description: After recently opening his own Edinburgh eatery, world-famous chef and TV star, Gordon Ramsay, was spotted dining at his life-long friend Tom Kitchin's city restaurant
articles.content:
Gordon Ramsay and his wife were spotted dining at fellow celebrity chef Tom Kitchin's Edinburgh restaurant last week, as Ramsay recently opened his own venue in the city.
